alert.note: Alert for Southeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 22 at 9:51PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...East winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Southeast Prince William Sound. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...High winds could move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: A high wind watch means there is potential for a hazardous high wind event. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
